**Use pkgdown build_article with Quarto version 1.4**

### YAML header text

``` yaml
title: "TITLE"
output: rmarkdown::html_vignette
vignette: >
  %\VignetteIndexEntry{TITLE}
  %\VignetteEngine{knitr::rmarkdown}
  %\VignetteEncoding{UTF-8}
```

```{r}
#| include: false
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  eval = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```
